protocol_name: Assay of urine Hg concentrations measurement
protocol_name_html: Assay of urine Hg concentrations measurement
manuscript_citation: Lu Z, Ma Y, Gao L, Li Y, Li Q, Qiang M (2018) Urine mercury levels correlate with DNA methylation of imprinting gene H19 in the sperm of reproductive-aged men. PLoS ONE 13(4): e0196314. doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0196314

components.data: All containers need to be soaked in nitric acid (10%) for 24h and then rinse with double-deionized water (DDW) .
components.name: Description

source_data.description: All containers need to be soaked in nitric acid (10%) for 24h and then rinse with double-deionized water (DDW) .

components.data: For total Hg measurement, the urine samples will be digested using the brominating procedure
components.name: Section

source_data.section: For total Hg measurement, the urine samples will be digested using the brominating procedure

components.data: Collect 50ml midstream urine with clean plastic container.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Collect 50ml midstream urine with clean plastic container.

components.data: For total Hg measurement, the urine samples will be digested using the brominating procedure
components.name: Section

source_data.section: For total Hg measurement, the urine samples will be digested using the brominating procedure

components.data: Add DDW to fill the volume up to 25 ml.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add DDW to fill the volume up to 25 ml.

components.data: For total Hg measurement, the urine samples will be digested using the brominating procedure
components.name: Section

source_data.section: For total Hg measurement, the urine samples will be digested using the brominating procedure

components.data: Switch on the HG - AFS 9700, and preheat 20 minutes. Urinary mercury is determined in the experimental conditions indicated in Table 1.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Switch on the HG - AFS 9700, and preheat 20 minutes. Urinary mercury is determined in the experimental conditions indicated in Table 1.

components.data: Hg fluorescent intensity is assayed by using a fully-automatic double-channel hydride generation atomic fluorescence spectrometer (HG - AFS 9700)
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Hg fluorescent intensity is assayed by using a fully-automatic double-channel hydride generation atomic fluorescence spectrometer (HG - AFS 9700)

source_data.description:
Parameters	
High negative voltage of PMT	270V
Atomizer temperature	        Rome Temperature
Atomizer height	                7 mm
Lamp current	                30 mA
Flow rate of carrier gas	600 mL/min
Flow rate of shield gas	        800 mL/min
Measurement method	        Std. curve
Read method	                Peak area
Delay time	                3s
Read time	                24s
Injection volume	        2.0 mL
Resonance wavelength	        253.7 nm
source_data.os_name: Table1  The operating parameters of the AFS-9700 HG-AFS for the Determination of Hg

components.data: Calibration regression curves at seven points (0, 0.2, 0.4, 0.8, 1.2, 1.6 and 2.0 ug/L) treated as the samples bromination procedure.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Calibration regression curves at seven points (0, 0.2, 0.4, 0.8, 1.2, 1.6 and 2.0 ug/L) treated as the samples bromination procedure.

components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spiked recovery test is performed to ensure the precision and accuracy of the analyses.

components.data: To avoid possible contamination during the digestion procedure and sample manipulation, a blank solution is used through the preparation and device assay process along every twenty samples.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: To avoid possible contamination during the digestion procedure and sample manipulation, a blank solution is used through the preparation and device assay process along every twenty samples.

components.data: Hg fluorescent intensity is assayed by using a fully-automatic double-channel hydride generation atomic fluorescence spectrometer (HG - AFS 9700)
components.name: Section

source_data.section: Hg fluorescent intensity is assayed by using a fully-automatic double-channel hydride generation atomic fluorescence spectrometer (HG - AFS 9700)

components.data: A sample of standard materials with known reference concentrations of Hg is prepared and carried through the preparation and assay processes along every twenty urine samples to verify the stability of the process.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: A sample of standard materials with known reference concentrations of Hg is prepared and carried through the preparation and assay processes along every twenty urine samples to verify the stability of the process.

components.data: Transfer 2 ml of the urine sample to a into 25 ml caped glass tubes. Add 5 mL of 8mol/L nitric acid, anti-foaming agent (a few drops) and 2 ml of 0.0599mol/L potassium bromate - 0.0234mol/L potassium bromide reagent, respectively
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer 2 ml of the urine sample to a into 25 ml caped glass tubes. Add 5 mL of 8mol/L nitric acid, anti-foaming agent (a few drops) and 2 ml of 0.0599mol/L potassium bromate - 0.0234mol/L potassium bromide reagent, respectively

components.data: For total Hg measurement, the urine samples will be digested using the brominating procedure
components.name: Section

source_data.section: For total Hg measurement, the urine samples will be digested using the brominating procedure

components.data: Tightly capped glass tubes and allow standing on bench for 20 min to complete breakdown of organic Hg compounds.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Tightly capped glass tubes and allow standing on bench for 20 min to complete breakdown of organic Hg compounds.

components.data: For total Hg measurement, the urine samples will be digested using the brominating procedure
components.name: Section

source_data.section: For total Hg measurement, the urine samples will be digested using the brominating procedure

components.data: Add 10ml DDW, then add a few drops of 1.439mol/L hydroxylamine hydrochloride to remove free bromine after digestion.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 10ml DDW, then add a few drops of 1.439mol/L hydroxylamine hydrochloride to remove free bromine after digestion.
